rules_text:
Miracle {2}{R} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
Exile target instant, sorcery or creature card from your graveyard and copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If a creature spell is cast this way, it gains haste and “Exile this creature at the beginning of your next end step.”
